ComicInfo.Title: Into the Realm of Faerie!
ComicInfo.Summary: Into the Realm of Faerie!: Thor and Roger invade the realm of Faerie to rescue Thor's love while keeping the Casket of Ancient Winters out of Malekith's hands. They don't quite succeed. Balder has a chat with a Norn. Odin prepares for battle. Surtur prepares to invade Earth.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:28:03. [Issue ID 39111]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agnar,Roger Willis,Odin,Wormwood (villain),Thor,Surtur (villain),Heimdall,Fandral,Volstagg],Balder,Warriors Three [Hogun,Lorelei (villain),Dark Elves (villain),Wyrd (a Norn),Algrim the Strong (introduction, villain),Malekith (villain)
